class myml.my_classifier.MyClassifier(x_train, y_train, parameters, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

my classifier base class

_MyClassifier__backtracking(beta)¶

backtracking line search

use the provided beta values to determine optimum learning rate for current iteration

Args
beta (ndarray): 1xD array of weight coefficients
Return
Float: learning rate
_MyClassifier__compute_metrics(x, y, prediction_func=None)¶

compute metrics at the current classifier state

Args
x (ndarray): nXd array of input samples y (ndarray): nX1 of true labels prediction_func (function) - optional: prediction function
Returns
MetricSet: containing classifier performance metrics
_MyClassifier__current_split¶

retrieve split number

matches thread name to dictionary map of training splits

Returns
int: training split
Raises
Exception: if the thread doesn’t have an associated split number ThreadError: re raised
_MyClassifier__fast_grad_descent()¶

fast-gradient descent

perform gradient descent with the fast-gradient algorithm

_MyClassifier__generate_splits(x_train, y_train, x_val, y_val)¶

generate training splits

Args
x_train: nXd ndarray, training samples y_train: 1Xn ndarray, true training labels x_val: nXd ndarray, validation samples y_val: 1Xn ndarray, true validation labels
Returns
(x, y, [TrainingSplit])

fit()[source]¶

fit the classifier

proceeds through each cross validation split, training each using the algorithm defined by the ‘algo’ key provided in parameters

Returns
trained classifier

predict_with_best_fold(x, metric='error')[source]¶

predict the given labels

uses the provided metric to determine which fold to extract parameters. once identified, a new fold is generated and trained using those parameters.

Args
x (ndarray): nXd array of samples to predict metric (str) - optional: metric to use for finding the optimal
Returns
[({-1, 1})]: list of predictions
Raises
ValueError: if provided metric is not defined
set_log_queue(queue)[source]¶

set queue for logging metrics

Args
queue (multiprocessing.Queue): set the managing log queue
write_to_disk(path=None)[source]¶

write current classifier state to disk

Args
path (str) - optional: file path to store calassifier
class myml.my_multiclassifier.MultiClassifier(x_train, y_train, parameters, x_val=None, y_val=None, task='', classification_method='ovr', n_jobs=-1, log_path='', logging_level='none')[source]¶

_MultiClassifier__build_classifiers()¶

Raises

_MultiClassifier__get_training_sets()¶

_MultiClassifier__log_manager(log_queue, conn)¶

log manager

controlling process for child classifiers to route log messages through

Args
log_queue (multiprocessing.Queue): queue to receive child log messages conn (multiprocessing.Pipe): pipe to send termination message to parent process
Returns
None
_MultiClassifier__train_one(cv, conn, queue)¶

train a single classifier

child process to train a single child classifier

Args
cv (MyClassifier): classifier to fit conn (multiprocessing.Pipe): pipe to send success message to parent process queue (multiprocessing.Queue): pass completed classifers back to parent process
Returns
None
